query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBDocumentshare o WHERE o.checkListId = ?1 AND (o.statusStr IS NULL OR o.statusStr <> 'DELETED')
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBStagingDocumentshare o WHERE o.checkListId = ?1 AND (o.statusStr IS NULL OR o.statusStr <> 'DELETED')
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCheckList o WHERE o.cMPLimitProfileID = ?1 AND o.cMPCollateralID = ?2 AND o.checkListStatus <> 'OBSOLETE'
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCheckListItem o WHERE o.checkListItemRef = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBStagingCheckList o WHERE o.cMPLimitProfileID = ?1 AND o.cMPCollateralID = ?2 AND o.checkListStatus <> 'OBSOLETE'
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBStagingCheckListItem o WHERE o.checkListItemRef = ?1
